title: [Large-scale] Case-Based Instructional Design Development Workshop for Enhancing Computational Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and introductory digital tool usage experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for professionals to effectively design computational thinking education in elementary school settings

learning_goals: Computing thinking elements (decomposition, pattern recognition, abstraction, algorithm design) can be identified by analyzing real-world science problem cases
Learners can design case-based instructional activities (analysis-design-implementation-evaluation) differentiated into at least three levels based on learner proficiency
Participants can develop two or more computational thinking activities based on smartphones in a constrained technological environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
